Key Match Events: The match ended in a goalless draw, resulting in both teams collecting four yellow cards each.
Pre-Game Insights: Ghana was expected to win the match but failed to secure a victory, putting pressure on their performance.
Post-Match Reflections: Ghana's coach, Otto Addo, acknowledged the opponent's strengths while expressing his team's frustration.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match's importance was highlighted by the involvement of former Ghana coach James Kwasi Appiah, now coaching Sudan.
Others: The match was played at a venue temporarily approved by CAF due to Ghana's ban on hosting international games.
